com.mygdx.game

Class MainMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.BaseLevel
      • com.mygdx.game.MainMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor

    public class MainMenu
extends BaseLevel
implements com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor
    This class represents the menu screen. It is responsible for placing all objects within the level at the beginning and changing their position throughout
